name: fnmgp

stmt.origin: fnmpti(hs0, cmgp, universe, co(cv(hs0), csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)))))

body.origin:
|- wfn(cmgp, universe)
-| wcel(co(cv(hs0), csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)))), universe)
-| wceq(cmgp, cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0))))))
-| diffsc(hs0, universe)
body.pretty:
⊢ mulGrp[Fn]𝕌
⊣ (hs0[sSet]<(+ ` ndx),(× ` hs0)>)∈ 𝕌
⊣ mulGrp =(hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs0[sSet]<(+ ` ndx),(× ` hs0)>))
⊣ d(hs0, 𝕌)

-| diffsc(hs0, universe)
